org.eclipse.viatra.dse.base

Class GlobalContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.dse.base.GlobalContext

  • public class GlobalContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates new contexts for strategies. It is needed because of the multithreading.

      • tryStartNewThread

        public ExplorerThread tryStartNewThread(ThreadContext originalThreadContext,
                               org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier model,
                               boolean cloneModel,
                               IStrategy strategy)
        Starts a new thread to explore the design space.
        Parameters:
        originalThreadContext - The context of the thread which starts the new thread.
        model - The model to start from.
        cloneModel - It should be true in most cases.
        strategy - The strategy, the thread will use.
        Returns:
        The ExplorerThread

      • tryStartNewThread

        public ExplorerThread tryStartNewThread(ThreadContext originalThreadContext)
        Starts a new thread to explore the design space.
        Parameters:
        strategyBase - The Strategy.
        tedToClone - The model to clone. Hint: context.getTed()
        Returns:
        The newly created ExplorerThread. Null if the number of the current strategies reached their maximum.
